presidentSpeechKr 0.2.1

speech index data

Source: R/spidx.R
spidx.Rd

speech index data

spidx

Format

tibble with columns

president

대통령

field

분야

event

유형

title

연설문 제목

date

날짜

link

연설문 링크

Source

http://www.pa.go.kr/research/contents/speech/index.jsp

Examples

  spidx

#> # A tibble: 7,588 x 6
#>    president field  event   title                 date   link
